scenario.name: Sipwise NGCP
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=0] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=0]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=0]> Call-ID: [call_id] P-NGCP-CFGTEST: [field3 file="caller.csv" line=0] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Expires: 600 Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
